settings.trim_help:
Here you can configure for how long (in minutes) you desire Horizon to
persist the recent and failed jobs. Typically, recent jobs are kept
for one hour while all failed jobs are stored for an entire week.
settings.trim_recent_help: This table is used to display recent jobs in the Horizon dashboard.
settings.trim_pending_help: This table is used to display pending jobs in the Horizon dashboard.
settings.trim_completed_help: This table is used to display completed jobs in the Horizon dashboard.
settings.trim_recent_failed_help: This table is used to display recent failed jobs in the Horizon dashboard.
settings.trim_failed_help: This table is used to display failed jobs in the Horizon dashboard.
settings.trim_monitored_help: This table is used to display monitored jobs in the Horizon dashboard.

error.title: Connection Error
error.fetch_failed: Unable to fetch Horizon statistics. Please check your Redis configuration.

data.redis-memory-policy-tooltip:
The memory policy is the way the cache store will select what to remove when
the maxmemory limit is reached. The default is `noeviction`: New values
aren't saved when memory limit is reached. Click to view documentation.
